mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTACHED_FILE ( ATTACHED_FILE_NO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_NO, ORIGIN_FILE_NAME, SERVER_FILE_NAME, FILE_EXTENSION, FILE_ORDER, FILE_PATH, REGISTER_DATE ) VALUES ( ATTACHED_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{attachedFileNo}, #{boardType}, #{boardNo}, #{originFileName}, #{serverFileName}, #{fileExtension}, #{fileOrder}, #{filePath}, #{registerDate} )
